issue.title: [R] Dataset vignette download script likely to fail with default options
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14652](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14652). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is a script in the dataset vignette (which contains a script for downloading a dataset from S3.  However, the files are large and the default R timeout for downloads is 60 seconds.  The instructions should be updated to recommend the user increase their timeout option value, e.g.:

 

`options(timeout = max(300, getOption("timeout")))`
